Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
  Tournament

public class Tournament
extends java.lang.Object

A main class that includes final variables set at the start of the program, save routines and rules for division sizes v.1.1 added division sizes as configurable properties fix tournament date here!

Author:
aulaskar
